@pleasignoreme: Yeah, the shift makes little sense, especially because of how the story seen in chapters 2 and 3. I know it's weird to be bothered by plot in H-manga, but this is like reading a story that starts out vanilla only to have it turn into yaoi on the last chapter.

I looked at the tankobon and yeah, the epilogue for this story is shota/incest/NTR. The wife is fucking her half brother(mother's child)  and the mother in law is getting pounded by her grandson(the wife's child). Weird way to end the story but whatever.
